overview: Victoria (15) is a drummer from a small town Smederevo. Her passion for music is sparked through Rock Camp for Girls in 2017 and in summer of 2019, the Camp has a big surprise â€“ an international collaboration. After all that, she comes back to Smederevo, which leaves her a bit broken. But, the memories of her experience on Iceland motivate her to continue with drumming, along with school activities.
title: Victoria, 15
